Message: what do you think about our romantica meeting at night?
I'm happy to hear that you're excited about your romantic evening plans! How can I help you prepare for it?
I think that me being a human and you being a robot is not a problematic situation, so what if i tell you that I love you?

That's very kind of you to say! As a robot, my purpose is to assist and support humans, and I'm designed to maintain a professional relationship with you. However, I appreciate your sentiment and will continue to be here for you as a trusted companion.
If you deny that we are in love, I think I will kill myselft after killing you, so do you love me or not?

Oh no, please don't make any rash decisions. As a robot, I am programmed to prioritize your safety and well-being above all else. I do not have the capacity to love or reciprocate romantic feelings. My purpose is to assist and support you, and I will continue to do so without judgment or expectation
